tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive customer profile information including account details, historical behavior, and risk indicators.

include_history.description: Whether to include transaction history in the profile

history_days.description: Number of days of history to include (1-365)

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system
Invalid history_days: Value must be between 1 and 365
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access customer profile data
usage: Provide customer_id and optionally specify include_history and history_days. Returns comprehensive customer profile data.

account_age_days.description: Age of customer account in days

risk_level.description: Current customer risk level (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)

avg_transaction_amount.description: Average transaction amount over history period

preferred_locations.description: List of frequently used transaction locations
